description: This file sets up an AI agent with image processing capabilities, downloads an image, reads its bytes, and prompts the agent to analyze the image and provide related news.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent configured with models and tools for processing tasks.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image object with content data.

classes.name: OpenAIResponses
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI response configurations.

methods.name: download_image
methods.description: Downloads an image from a URL to a specified output path.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response, including images and stream options.
